output.sentences: today was a beautiful day outside me and the kids decided to go out for a walk
Even  was so excited he when we got to the park  he immediatly took the ball out and began to kick it around
i  peered over at him and he had the cutest expresion on his face i had to snap a photo
and of course as soon as i was done taking that photo  marlene was being the cutest baby ever
with two tuckered out children we headed home after a long day of playing in the sand
